dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1217 IS: Fishing Industry Credit Enhancement Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. King (for himself, Ms. Murkowski, Mr. Murphy, Mr. Coons, Ms. Blunt Rochester, and Mr. Sullivan) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Farm Credit Act of 1971 to support the commercial fishing industry.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fishing Industry Credit Enhancement Act of 2025.

section.header: Extension of credit to businesses providing services to producers or harvesters of aquatic products

paragraph.header: Eligibility for credit and financial services
paragraph.text: Section 1.9 of the Farm Credit Act of 1971 (12 U.S.C. 2017) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking or at the end;
by redesignating paragraph (3) as paragraph (4); and
by inserting after paragraph (2) the following:

paragraph.text: persons furnishing to producers or harvesters of aquatic products services directly related to their operating needs; or

Section 1.11(c)(1) of the Farm Credit Act of 1971 (12 U.S.C. 2019(c)(1)) is amended by inserting and to persons furnishing services directly related to the operating needs of producers or harvesters of aquatic products after needs.

subsection.text: Section 2.4(a) of the Farm Credit Act of 1971 (12 U.S.C. 2075(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (3), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
persons furnishing to producers or harvesters of aquatic products services directly related to their operating needs.
